input.sentences: the red and white stand was perfect for the fair .
the carousel got a lot of attention and focus .
the small performance was very entertaining .
we gathered together at the fair for good times .
there were so many prizes too win !
output.sentences: As I entered the 4th of July carnival I saw a red and white striped stand.
In the center of the carnival was a carousel with a lot of people around it.
A barbershop quartet performed classic songs like Yankee Doodle Dandy.
Navigating through all of the people at fair was hard to do.
When I pushed my way to the opposite side of the fair I saw the table with all sorts of raffle prizes you could win.
